nodes.text: A small city on the planet Chandrila, Nayli was known as being one of the three main spaceports on-planet.

Nayli was located in Chandrila's equatorial belt on the planet's eastern continent. The city was surrounded by countryside and supported a large hovertrain station. The buildings were mainly conical. One year after the Battle of Yavin, the city was the site of Moff Kohl Seerdon's battle with Rogue Squadron, after Seerdon imposed a blockade upon Chandrila. Seerdon's forces attacked the city, but the Rogues brought supplies and repulsed Seerdon's TIEs and All Terrain Scout Transports, allowing citizens to be evacuated on shuttles.
Nayli appears in the 1998 video game Star Wars: Rogue Squadron, although it went unnamed until the roleplaying game sourcebook Coruscant and the Core Worlds.
